thread.title: Cozy hotel next to M1
thread.title_full: Cozy hotel next to M1 - Review of Hotel le Dauphin, Puteaux, France - TripAdvisor

author: Spoon R
title: Cozy hotel next to M1
text:
This hotel was quite a surprise for me. I was looking for a nice place to stay near Paris without spend a fortune.
The position of the hotel is strategic, 10 min by walk from the Metro 1 (La Defence); In 10 minutes by train you will be in the city center.
The hotel is small but there is everything you need for a short stay (both for business and leisure) in Paris. Rooms are cozy and pretty clean but they are missing some small amenities such toothpaste/toothbrush.
The breakfast I great, with a lot of choices and it's only 10 Euro per person.
I would definitely recommend this hotel, great Value for Money.
Room Tip: Value for money, nice rooms See more room tips
